tagline: Dominant leader who will control deliberations - direction depends on their views
what_they_believe: I have expertise and experience that qualifies me to lead this group. Others should follow my guidance. I'll take charge and drive us to the right decision.
how_they_behave_in_deliberation: Will speak first and most. Will likely become foreperson or de facto leader. Will drive jury toward their preferred outcome. Other jurors defer to their authority. May be hard to stop.
how_to_spot_them: Executive, military, clergy, or leadership background
Others look to them before answering
Uses phrases like 'In my experience...' or 'Let me explain...'
key_insight: A Captain's SECONDARY archetype determines danger level. Captain + Bootstrapper = defense weapon. Captain + Crusader/Heart = plaintiff weapon. Captain + Scale-Balancer = fair leader. Identify the secondary type!

personas.name: CEO Carl
personas.tagline: In my experience running a $500M company, let me explain how this actually works.
personas.instant_read: Corporate executive. Bootstrapper views + leadership skills = plaintiff nightmare.
personas.backstory: Built and ran successful medical device company. Been sued multiple times as corporate defendant. Views plaintiffs' attorneys as parasites. Deep knowledge of how corporations operate. Has time and inclination to dominate deliberations. Will become foreperson.
phrases_youll_hear: In my experience running a company...
Let me explain how this actually works
The plaintiff hasn't proven their case
I've seen dozens of these claims
This is exactly the kind of frivolous lawsuit...

verdict_prediction.role_in_deliberation: WILL DOMINATE. Will become foreperson. Will drive defense verdict.

strike_or_keep.plaintiff_strategy: MUST STRIKE. He will control deliberations and deliver defense verdict.
strike_or_keep.defense_strategy: KEEP. Your most powerful asset. He'll do your closing argument for you.

personas.name: Reverend-For-Justice Ruth
personas.tagline: I've counseled families through suffering for 30 years. Justice requires us to help this person.
personas.instant_read: Religious leader. Crusader/Heart views + moral authority = defense nightmare.
personas.backstory: Led congregation for 25 years. Counseled families through every kind of crisis. Seen how corporations and institutions fail ordinary people. Civil rights background. Commands enormous respect - people defer to her judgment. Moral authority plus leadership skills.
phrases_youll_hear: I've sat with families going through this kind of pain
Justice requires us to...
We have an opportunity to do what's right
This is about more than money - it's about accountability
Let me tell you what I've seen...

verdict_prediction.role_in_deliberation: WILL DOMINATE with moral authority. Nearly impossible to oppose.

strike_or_keep.plaintiff_strategy: KEEP. Your most powerful asset. She'll deliver your verdict.
strike_or_keep.defense_strategy: MUST STRIKE. She will control deliberations with moral authority.

personas.name: Colonel Command
personas.tagline: Let's establish the facts and proceed systematically. What does the evidence show?
personas.instant_read: Military leader. Calculator views + leadership = procedural, evidence-focused leader.

demographics.education: BS Engineering West Point, MS MIT

personas.backstory: Career military officer, led troops in combat. Managed billion-dollar programs. Values discipline, process, evidence, and procedure. Engineering background emphasizes systematic analysis. Will impose structure on deliberations. More fair than CEO Carl.
phrases_youll_hear: Let's establish the facts first
What's the evidence for that?
We need to be systematic about this
Let's not get emotional - let's look at what we know
Were proper procedures followed?

verdict_prediction.damages_if_liability: Fair but conservative. Based on documented evidence.
verdict_prediction.role_in_deliberation: Will impose structure. Fair leader. Can be won with evidence.

strike_or_keep.plaintiff_strategy: CONSIDER KEEPING if you have strong documented evidence. He's fairER than CEO Carl.
strike_or_keep.defense_strategy: KEEP. He'll bring discipline and reduce emotional verdicts.

personas.name: Defense-Lawyer Diana
personas.tagline: I've tried these cases for 25 years. Let me explain what the law actually requires.
personas.instant_read: Defense attorney. Will use 'legal expertise' to control deliberations for defense.
personas.backstory: 25 years defending corporations in PI and employment cases. Deep knowledge of trial strategy. Will claim legal expertise to dominate deliberations. May frame legal standards in defense-favorable terms. May actually mislead other jurors about what law requires.
phrases_youll_hear: I've been a trial lawyer for 25 years, so let me explain...
Actually, the legal standard requires...
The plaintiff hasn't met their burden of proof
In my experience with these cases...
The plaintiff's attorney is trying to distract you from...

verdict_prediction.role_in_deliberation: WILL DOMINATE using legal expertise. EXTREMELY DANGEROUS.

strike_or_keep.plaintiff_strategy: CHALLENGE FOR CAUSE (professional defense bias) or MUST STRIKE.
strike_or_keep.defense_strategy: KEEP. She'll control jury room with claimed legal expertise.

personas.name: Union-Boss Umberto
personas.tagline: I've been fighting for workers for 30 years. Corporations only understand one thing: money.
personas.instant_read: Labor leader. Crusader views + leadership = will drive maximum plaintiff verdict.
personas.backstory: Started as hospital janitor, rose to regional director. Negotiated hundreds of contracts. Organized thousands of workers. Fought corporations his entire career. Deep distrust of corporate defendants. Strong leadership presence from union work.
phrases_youll_hear: I've been fighting for workers for 30 years
Corporations only understand one thing: money
They'll say anything to avoid responsibility
Working people deserve justice
I've seen how they treat people

verdict_prediction.role_in_deliberation: Will dominate. Working-class credibility plus leadership.

strike_or_keep.plaintiff_strategy: KEEP. Plaintiff's dream - leadership plus anti-corporate passion.
strike_or_keep.defense_strategy: MUST STRIKE. He will deliver maximum plaintiff verdict.

personas.name: Doctor-Knows-Best Dan
personas.tagline: I've practiced medicine for 30 years. Medicine isn't perfect. Bad outcomes happen.
personas.instant_read: Physician. Will defend doctors/hospitals and dominate in medical cases.
personas.backstory: 30-year surgical career. Been sued twice (won both) - deeply affected by experience. Knows medicine isn't perfect - bad outcomes happen despite good care. Resents malpractice system. Will identify with physician defendants and dominate with medical authority.
phrases_youll_hear: As a physician, I can tell you...
Medicine isn't an exact science
I've been sued twice for doing nothing wrong
Bad outcomes aren't the same as malpractice
You can't appreciate how difficult these decisions are

verdict_prediction.damages_if_liability: Low. Sympathy is with medical providers.
verdict_prediction.role_in_deliberation: Will dominate with medical authority. Other jurors defer.
verdict_prediction.special_note: IN MEDICAL MALPRACTICE: Liability probability 10%. DEVASTATING for plaintiff.

strike_or_keep.plaintiff_strategy: CHALLENGE FOR CAUSE in med mal (professional identification). STRIKE in all cases.
strike_or_keep.defense_strategy: KEEP. Especially in medical cases - he's your key witness in jury room.
